item.title: Self-Hosted Series: Tandoor
item.description:
Self-Hosting Tandoor Recipes: Taking Control of Your Recipe Collection

If you’re like me, you’ve probably got recipes scattered everywhereâ€”saved in browser bookmarks, tucked away in old notes, maybe even written down on random scraps of paper. It’s a mess. I wanted a better way to organize everything, but I didn’t want to rely on a third-party service. I wanted something self-hosted, something I controlled. That’s where Tandoor Recipes comes in.
